title: Elegant Downtown Montreal City Break with Three Restaurants, Indoor Pool & Onsite Spa
description:
Soak up the vibrant energy of Downtown Montreal from this stylish hideaway, where mid-century glamour meets contemporary opulence. Unwind in style in the modern rooms and suites - some inspired by the city's trendy neighbourhoods - take a dip in the serene indoor pool and recharge with soothing treatments at the Moment Spa.

Savour French-inspired cuisine at Roselys, sip artisanal cocktails at Bar Nacarat or grab a pick-me-up at the chic Cafe Krema. With direct access to Central Station and Montreal Underground City, you're perfectly placed to explore Crescent Street’s nightlife and the charm of Old Montreal. Whether you're chasing culture or cuisine, this refined retreat delivers it all.
offer_address: 900 Rene Levesque Boulevard W, Montreal, Quebec H3B 4A5, Canada

title: Sophisticated Downtown Montreal Retreat with Two Restaurants & Tranquil Spa
description:
Experience the enchanting allure of Montreal with an elegant stay at this urban oasis, nestled in the heart of the city's historic Golden Square Mile and only moments from the esteemed McGill University. Soak up the skyline views from the hotel's gallery-style windows, sip on signature cocktails in the 70s themed Alice Bar, tuck into a hearty meal at the French-style bistro, Le Petit Opus Café and indulge in pamper sessions at the Eqlib Spa.

Step outside and you will find yourself surrounded by the city's finest museums, art galleries, the nearby Mount Royal Park, upscale boutiques and vibrant nightlife. Channeling a European flair with its Victorian architecture, stroll down the cobblestone streets of Old Montreal and visit the majestic Notre-Dame Basilica for an immersive city experience.
offer_address: 1050 Sherbrooke Street West, Montreal, Quebec, H3A-2R6, Canada

vendor_name: Sofitel Montreal Le Carré Doré / Golden Mile
title: Sophisticated Montreal Downtown French-Inspired Luxury with Onsite Restaurant & Cocktail Lounge
description:
Zhuzh up your Canadian escape with a dash of French flair at this five-star Sofitel sanctuary perfectly positioned at the foot of Mount Royal in downtown Montreal’s fashionable Golden Mile. Unwind in chic, light-filled rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows and glittering city views, while enjoying top-tier amenities and world-class hospitality.

Savour gourmet French cuisine with a local twist at Renoir Restaurant, then sip handcrafted cocktails at the stylish NINI Salon à Cocktails. Step outside to explore the Montreal Museum of Fine Arts or the upscale boutiques along Sainte-Catherine Street. With the metro moments away, reaching Old Montreal and the iconic Notre-Dame Basilica is a breeze.
offer_address: 1155 Sherbrooke Street West, Montreal, Quebec H3A 2N3, Canada

title: Stylish Old Montreal City Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Absinthe Bar
description: Say bonjour to the perfect city break with a stay at InterContinental Montreal, an IHG Hotel masterfully positioned between Old Montreal’s historic basilicas and downtown’s world-class bars, bistros and high-end boutiques. Old-world hospitality abounds - swim laps at the hotel's top-notch saltwater pool, savour mouthwatering cuisine and imported French wines at Osco! or head to Sarah B. absinthe bar for cosy alcove ambience and an authentic taste of the good stuff.
offer_address: 360 Saint Antoine Ouest, Montreal, Quebec H2Y 3X4, Canada
